column5: My house is close to a baseball stadium , grocery store, Starbucks, a mall, dining, nightclubs etc. Youâ€™ll enjoy my place because it's quiet, clean and safe. This AirBnb home is good for mom/daughter trips, solo adventurers, and business travelers but no pets nor small children.   For travelers that travel by two, I have two rooms available. I do charge for each room but the convenience is there for you. My dog Elli is waiting. Please write with any questions! Happy travels!
